basic.description: This laboratory offers an introduction to quantitative techniques and to the chemical laboratory. Topics include stoichiometry, atomic spectra, gases, as well as acids and bases.
basic.subject: CHM
basic.title: General Chemistry I Laboratory

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: MAC 1105 with a grade of "C-" or higher or placement beyond MAC 1105. Corequisite: CHM 1045.
